magpie.csp.diagramdata

Class TernaryPhaseDiagramStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.csp.diagramdata.PhaseDiagramStatistics
      • magpie.csp.diagramdata.TernaryPhaseDiagramStatistics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Deprecated.

    public class TernaryPhaseDiagramStatistics
extends PhaseDiagramStatistics
    Holds information about a set of ternary phase diagrams

      • getCompoundVector

        protected int[] getCompoundVector(int[] sites)
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from class: PhaseDiagramStatistics
        Given a list of elements on each site of a structure, determine which prototypes exist on each site of the corresponding phase diagram.
        Specified by:
        getCompoundVector in class PhaseDiagramStatistics
        Parameters:
        sites - Which elements are on each site
        Returns:
        x[i] is the index of the prototype structure of the compound existing at composition i in PhaseDiagramStatistics.CommonCompositions (0 for no compound)

      • incrementCounter

        protected boolean incrementCounter(int[] counter)
        Deprecated. 
        Increment a counter that iterates through all combinations of elements in a phase diagram.
        For a ternary system, it goes A->B->C for unary, AB->AC->BC for binary, ABC for ternary
        For a quaternary, it goes A->B->C for unary, AB->AC->AD->BC->BD->CD for binary, and so on...
        Parameters:
        counter - Counter to be incremented
        Returns:
        Whether it iterator is done
